name: Knight son's epic adventure!
description:
Three little kids trying to find out what their roots are by going on an adventure and slay a monster.

A stationary screen where 3 kids are fighting a monster. The battles are automatic and don't require an input from the user other than deciding which character position will take at the start of the battle.
